Find your future with us.The Boeing Company is seeking an Experienced Complex Hosting Infrastructure Architect to join their team in Bangalore, KA, India.  A successful candidate will focus on projects and functions supporting the Infrastructure Architecture Consulting team (Complex Hosting), including, but not limited to Global Infrastructure Architecture & Design, Cloud Architecture & Design and Maintaining relationships with IT Business Partners for requirements, design and implementation of infrastructure projects.  This position will place the candidate in a role where they would have the opportunity to make an impact on the results of the future. The team offers a collaborative mentoring environment where you the candidate will have the opportunity to learn from and lead others.Position Responsibilities•    Evaluate feasibility of architecture solutions and alternatives that fulfill infrastructure requirements
•    Develop sound business cases in order to obtain sponsorship and secure funding
•    Develop service requirements and designs encompassing Global, Strategic Data Center, Local Presence Server Rooms (LPSR), Classified, Optimal Enterprise Integration (OEI), etc. 
•    Acts as project/process interface and escalation point for coordinating design components and implementation with service providers and stakeholders 
•    Communicate Information Technology infrastructure, service and technology changes and provide guidance
•    Design cost effective solutions that align to Information technology infrastructure and architectural standards, exploring cloud first solutions and leveraging design patterns for reuse.
•    Collaborate with Information Security, Global Trade Controls, Global Privacy Office and Legal (domestically and International) 
•    Contribute to architecture and data/information management standards and strategies
•    Establish design constraints and ensure architecture conforms to requirements
•    Monitors and provides guidance during design and implementation efforts 
•    Documents infrastructure hosting requirements and translates them into infrastructure design solution options to satisfy the hosting requirements. 
•    Creates integrated design package documenting recommended design solution details
•    Validates with the requestor and stakeholders that the infrastructure has been delivered per the design
•    Engages service task performers to ensure tasks are performed in time to meet the requestor need date as detailed in the implementation plan.
